note.name: Dogs are better than cats 03
note.text: Dogs respond when you call their name (unlike cats, who just ignore you)

note.name: Dogs are best 01
note.text: Dogs are the best pets you can ever have

note.name: Dogs are best 01
note.text: Dogs are best pets you can ever have!

note.name: Cats are better
note.text: Cats are better than dogs because those are independent!

note.name: Flowers are pretty 01
note.text: Flowers are pretty and nice gift!
